mapper.insert: insert into ca_sys_code( para_code, para_value, para_type, is_valid, notes )values( #{paraCode}, #{paraValue}, #{paraType.id}, #{isValid}, #{notes} )
mapper.select: select ks.id as id, ks.para_code as paraCode, ks.para_value as paraValue, ks.para_type as paraType, ks.is_valid as isValid, ks.notes as note, ksty.id as TypeId, ksty.para_type as typeParaType, ksty.notes as typeNotes from ca_sys_code ks,ca_sys_param_type ksty where ks.para_type=ksty.id order by id
select id, para_code as paraCode, para_value as paraValue, para_type as paraType, is_valid as isValid, notes from ca_sys_code where id=#{id}
select id, para_code as paraCode, para_value as paraValue, para_type as paraType, is_valid as isValid, notes from ca_sys_code where para_code=#{paraCode}

select csc.id as id, csc.para_code as paraCode, csc.para_value as paraValue, csc.para_type as paraType, csc.is_valid as isValid, csc.notes, cspt.id as typeId, cspt.para_type as typeParaType, cspt.notes as typeNotes from ca_sys_code csc,ca_sys_param_type cspt where csc.para_type=cspt.id and cspt.para_type=#{paraType.paraType} and csc.is_valid=#{isValid}
